metadata.title: BIGCARJOB Women's Summer Short Sleeve Midi Dress Casual Round Neck Fit and Flared Swing Dress Ladies Party A-line Dress

Feature : Scoop Neck;High waist;A-line;Midi dress;Short sleeve( can dress it with cardigan,leggings tights ,boots and scarf in cold days;dress with a belt,a cute necklace and sandals if in hot days)
Multi unique Print Halloween design for your halloween party ,simple and classic style is easy to accessorize for all kinds of looks£¬also a great gift for your wife , mother or friends .
Note: Please check the size details which we provide on the detail page (Not the Amazon size chart) before you place the order.
description: Funny high quality Halloween dress make you different in this special days Short sleeve can suit all season,you can dress it with cardigan,leggings tights ,boots and scarf in cold days dress it with sandals or flats if in hot days .or match a petticoat underneath will make you charmian, unique style,fashionable and elegant.  Featuer : Stretchy and lightweight Fit and Flared A-line Muti-Halloween Prints for options:Pumpkin,ghost,witches,candy,bat,skull,black cat,spider web.Halloween Themed Casual Dress. Due to monitor settings and monitor pixel definitions, it may be a little color different. Garment Care: Hand wash in cold water, machine washable, no shrinkage , no fading.
